Title: Chapter Eight: The Griefbearers
Writer: Jeremy Slater (created by), William Peter Blatty (inspired by the novel by), Marcus Gardley
Actors: Alfonso Herrera, Ben Daniels, Hannah Kasulka, Brianne Howey
Plot: Tomas, Marcus and Mother Bernadette race against time to defeat the demon, and the Rance family find themselves drawn into the conflict.
